select
distinct
from device
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update device
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nk_no = #{record.nkNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
productrawtotal_id = #{record.productrawtotalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_no = #{record.deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_flow = #{record.deviceFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
design_power = #{record.designPower,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
practical_power = #{record.practicalPower,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EXHUST_NO = #{record.exhustNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EXHUST_ID = #{record.exhustId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
yearrun_days = #{record.yearrunDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
design_unit = #{record.designUnit,jdbcType=CHAR},

update device set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nk_no = #{record.nkNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, productrawtotal_id = #{record.productrawtotalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_no = #{record.deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_flow = #{record.deviceFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, design_power = #{record.designPower,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, practical_power = #{record.practicalPower,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EXHUST_NO = #{record.exhustNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXHUST_ID = #{record.exhustId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yearrun_days = #{record.yearrunDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, design_unit = #{record.designUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}

update device
nk_no = #{nkNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
productrawtotal_id = #{productrawtotalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_no = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_flow = #{deviceFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
design_power = #{designPower,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
practical_power = #{practicalPower,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EXHUST_NO = #{exhustNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EXHUST_ID = #{exhustId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
yearrun_days = #{yearrunDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
design_unit = #{designUnit,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update device set nk_no = #{nkNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, productrawtotal_id = #{productrawtotalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_no = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_flow = #{deviceFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, design_power = #{designPower,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, practical_power = #{practicalPower,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EXHUST_NO = #{exhustNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXHUST_ID = #{exhustId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yearrun_days = #{yearrunDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, design_unit = #{designUnit,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
